```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(haven)
data <- read_xpt("/Users/shiyun/Desktop/EDAV/Final Project/DR1IFF_J.XPT")
depress <- read_xpt("/Users/shiyun/Desktop/EDAV/Final Project/DPQ_J.XPT")
data2 <- dplyr::select(data, SEQN, DR1ICAFF)
data2 <- data2 |>
  group_by(SEQN) |>
  dplyr::summarise(CaffConsump = sum(DR1ICAFF))
merged_data <- merge(data2, depress, by = "SEQN", all = TRUE)
```
